Sample.Title: iCdx2 Cells, clone 3, 48hr, replicate 1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Doxycycline treatment for different time points decribed in each sample. Some samples were treated with LPA as indicated.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: Cell were cultured on MEFs in humdified 5%Co2 , 21% O2 incubator
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNeasy mini RNA kit Bulk MARS-seq 3 primed library

Sample.Description: iCdx2 Cells, clone 3, 48hr, replicate 1
Sample.Data-Processing: Samples were analyzed using UTAP software (Kohen et al. 2019). Reads were trimmed using CutAdapt (Martin 2011) (parameters: -a ADAPTER1 -a “A{10}” -a “T{10}” -A “A{10}” -A “T{10}” –times 2 -u 3 -u -3 -q 20 -m 25). Reads were mapped to genome mm10 using STAR (Dobin et al. 2013) v2.4.2a (parameters: –alignEndsType EndToEnd, –outFilterMismatchNoverLmax 0.05, –twopassMode Basic - alignSoftClipAtReferenceEnds No). Sample counting was done using STAR, quantifying mm10 RefSeq annotated genes. Further analysis was done for genes having a minimum of five reads in at least one sample. Normalization of the counts and differential expression analysis was performed using DESeq2 (Love et al. 2014) with the parameters betaPrior = true, cooksCutoff = false, and independentFiltering = false. Assembly: mm10

Sample.Data-Processing: Samples were analyzed using UTAP software (Kohen et al. 2019). Reads were trimmed using CutAdapt (Martin 2011) (parameters: -a ADAPTER1 -a “A{10}” -a “T{10}” -A “A{10}” -A “T{10}” –times 2 -u 3 -u -3 -q 20 -m 25). Reads were mapped to genome mm10 using STAR (Dobin et al. 2013) v2.4.2a (parameters: –alignEndsType EndToEnd, –outFilterMismatchNoverLmax 0.05, –twopassMode Basic - alignSoftClipAtReferenceEnds No). Sample counting was done using STAR, quantifying mm10 RefSeq annotated genes. Further analysis was done for genes having a minimum of five reads in at least one sample. Normalization of the counts and differential expression analysis was performed using DESeq2 (Love et al. 2014) with the parameters betaPrior = true, cooksCutoff = false, and independentFiltering = false. Assembly: mm10

Sample.Data-Processing: Samples were analyzed using UTAP software (Kohen et al. 2019). Reads were trimmed using CutAdapt (Martin 2011) (parameters: -a ADAPTER1 -a “A{10}” -a “T{10}” -A “A{10}” -A “T{10}” –times 2 -u 3 -u -3 -q 20 -m 25). Reads were mapped to genome mm10 using STAR (Dobin et al. 2013) v2.4.2a (parameters: –alignEndsType EndToEnd, –outFilterMismatchNoverLmax 0.05, –twopassMode Basic - alignSoftClipAtReferenceEnds No). Sample counting was done using STAR, quantifying mm10 RefSeq annotated genes. Further analysis was done for genes having a minimum of five reads in at least one sample. Normalization of the counts and differential expression analysis was performed using DESeq2 (Love et al. 2014) with the parameters betaPrior = true, cooksCutoff = false, and independentFiltering = false. Assembly: mm10

Sample.Title: 2 pooled synthetic-embryos, ex utero, from 3-days induced iCdx2 cells, replicate 1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Doxycycline treatment for sEmbryos.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: Ex utero culture protocol for sEmbryos. E8.5 in utero control were dissected and used for experiment directly.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA extracted according to 10x Genomics Chromium v3.1 Dual Index system kit instructions. 10x Genomics Chromium v3.1 Dual Index system (5000 cell target cell recovery).

Sample.Description: Cdx2-3d-2pooled 2 pooled synthetic embryos, ex utero, from 3-days induced iCdx2 cells. Single-cell RNA-seq
Sample.Data-Processing: Demultiplexing was done with cellranger/3.1.0 mkfastq. Alignment and quantification of single cell features was done with cellranger counts. Aggregation of multiple GEM wells was done using- cellranger aggr. Cells with under 200 expressing genes, over 4000 expressing genes or over 10% mitochondrial gene expression were filtered out for the rest of the analysis. Assembly: mm10 Supplementary files format and content: Processed data is divided into three different matrices created using Seurat 3.0: raw_counts.csv - contains raw counts of all genes across all cells, normalized_counts.csv - contains normalized counts of all genes across all cells, cell2sample.csv - contains information of each of the cells.

Assembly: mm10 Supplementary files format and content: Processed data is divided into three different matrices created using Seurat 3.0: raw_counts.csv - contains raw counts of all genes across all cells, normalized_counts.csv - contains normalized counts of all genes across all cells, cell2sample.csv - contains information of each of the cells.

Series.Title: Ex Utero Development of Post-Gastrulation Synthetic Embryos Generated Solely from Naïve Pluripotent Stem Cells
Series.Summary: This SuperSeries is composed of the SubSeries listed below.
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
